an7.21:4.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī, at the Sarandada Tree-shrine.
an7.21:4.3: Then several Licchavis went up to the Buddha,
an7.21:4.4: bowed, sat down to one side,
an7.21:4.6: “Licchavis, I will teach you these seven principles that ensure you don’t decline.
an7.21:4.7: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
an7.21:5.1: “And what are the seven principles that ensure you don’t decline?
an7.21:5.2: As long as the Vajjis meet frequently and have many meetings,
an7.21:5.3: they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.21:6.1: As long as the Vajjis meet in harmony, leave in harmony, and carry on their business in harmony,
an7.21:6.2: they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.21:7.1: As long as the Vajjis don’t make new decrees or abolish existing decrees, but undertake and follow the ancient Vajjian principles as they have been decreed,
an7.21:7.2: they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.21:8.1: As long as the Vajjis honor, respect, esteem, and venerate Vajjian elders, and think them worth listening to,
an7.21:8.2: they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.21:9.1: As long as the Vajjians don’t rape or abduct women or girls from their families and force them to live with them,
an7.21:9.2: they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.21:10.1: As long as the Vajjis honor, respect, esteem, and venerate the Vajjian shrines, whether inner or outer, not neglecting the proper spirit-offerings that were given and made in the past,
an7.21:10.2: they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.21:11.1: As long as the Vajjis arrange for proper protection, shelter, and security for perfected ones, so that
an7.21:11.2: more perfected ones might come to the realm and those already here may live in comfort,
an7.21:11.3: they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.21:12.1: As long as these seven principles that ensure you don’t decline last among the Vajjians, and as long as the Vajjians are seen following them,
an7.21:12.2: they can expect growth, not decline.”
